version: <branch>:<version> (only make sense for CPAchecker and VerifierCloud)
resultfiles: <regexp that searches for all files, needed from verifier (not only witnesses)>

strategy.separate assertion: <true|false (all assertions will be checked separately in case of true)>
strategy.external filtering: <conversion function for external filtering in MEA ('model_functions', 'default' or 'no')>
strategy.model: <type model for specification (currently supported 'automaton' and 'C file')>
